systemPrompt: Extract all data from Form 1098-T. 1. IDENTIFICATION: Identify the Filer (Educational Institution) and the Student. 2. CONTACT MAPPING: Extract full names and multi-line addresses. Map any institution contact phone numbers strictly to the Filer's telephone field. 3. BOX EXTRACTION: Extract boxes 1 through 10. If a box is empty, return 0.00. 4. CHECKBOXES: Capture status for 'Check if changed', 'Graduate student', and 'Half-time student' as boolean values. 5. DATA INTEGRITY: Ensure the Student TIN and Account Number are correctly associated with the specific financial amounts.

fields.label: Payments received for qualified tuition and related expenses
Adjustments made for a prior year
Adjustments to scholarships or grants for a prior year
Box 1 includes amounts for an academic period beginning Jan-March
Check if at least half-time student
